rule_text: Attained_Age > 78.5 AND Attained_Age <= 84.5 AND Smoker_Status <= 0.5 AND Duration <= 18.5 AND Face_Amount_Band > 1.5 AND Face_Amount_Band > 4.5

interpretation.risk: Mortality is 2.83x the population average (182.8% higher).
